description:
Voice on the Phone to Bunta in Stage 1, Ep23.
This is actually http://anidb.net/cr6784 [Tsuchiya Keiichi], who is considered the father of Drift and who is on the Technical advisory crew for the Anime series.
In Ep2, First Stage, the Speedstar drivers are shown watching and chatting over his video, The Drift Bible, a beginner`s guide to drift. Takumi buys Tsuchiya`s Best Motoring Video Special Vol. 41 video in Third Stage.
Here in the series, Keiichi and Bunta appear to be old friends.
Source: wiki
name: Tsuchiya
